name: Bob the Frog SP
description:
Yooo, Adiel Hernandez here!

Alright so real quick, you're gonna need a PS4 controller to play this otherwise you're gonna be struggling. Did I mention this was for PC and Mac? Well, it's for PC and Mac. Okay what else... oh, there's a controller_layout.png included, you're gonna need that too. This is a student project, I hate to keep emphasizing that but if you were expecting Kingdom Hearts 3 well... this is actually much better than that but with less heartless. I will revisit this game and it's core concepts one day but a lot of you were looking forward to this so here ya go, sorry to get your hopes up! But fighting the little red dudes is fun I will say that much.

Alright, later!
